attributes.action: please create educational courses, which give qualifications, and are flexible and cheaper for parents in full time work
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I would like to see courses, which give qualifications such as GCSEs, A Levels or Degrees, for adults with children who work full time and cannot afford the cost of distant learning courses, and are flexible to the needs of these people, so that they are able to continue to work but also pursue a qualification to succeed in a better career or change of career path.
